Copperpoint Brewing Company - Brewery Profile - Absolute Beer Skip to content Absolute Beer Reviews News Beer 101 Contact Brewery Overview, Profile, and Related News Copperpoint Brewing Company Boynton Beach, FL â€¢ Est. 2015 Outside the Copperpoint Brewing Company taproom in Boynton Beach, Florida Copperpoint Brewing Company Copperpoint Brewing Company is a production brewery with a beautifully designed and comfortable tasting room, featuring award-winning beers and rotating specials. The brewery was founded in 2015 and we are still independently owned and operated. No giant corporate ownership here. Since our opening we have grown significantly, but not without taking the time to make sure everything was done correctly. Quality is always our first priority. Deliberate Growth We have made sure to grow our distribution foot print slowly and organically. We want to watch that our beer is always handled properly and gets to our customers brewery-fresh. We will continue to be thoughtful about where and when our beer is available. Since opening We have doubled the size of the production area in the brewery. Now we have over 15,000 sq. ft of production space! With that we quadrupled our brewing space. We now have the capacity to brew over 5000 barrels a year. That is over 10,000 kegs of beer! True to Our Principles As we have grown, we still have the same high level of standards that we started with on day one. Buy the best north American made equipment, buy the best brewing ingredients available and maintain a happy company culture to make the best beer possible. It is very important to us to know where our equipment and ingredients come from, and also to maintain relationships with those producers. We are proud to go the extra mile. Consider things that normally get outsourced internationally like tap handles. Ours are hand made in Alabama. Some of our stainless steel tanks are built right here in Florida. This is not common in the industry, and also very costly, but it is very important to us. All of the water used for our beer goes through a very thorough purification process before it meets hops and malt. Reverse osmosis takes roughly 95% of the impurities out and then it goes through a UV sterilization process. Once the water is ready itâ€™s time for the freshest hops and ingredients from all over the the world. From Pacific Northwest hops to locally roasted coffee, only the best ingredients make their way into Copperpoint beers. For more information visit the brewery website at copperpointbrewingcompany.com . Copperpoint Brewing Company is an independent craft brewer. Is any of the info for this brewery incorrect or incomplete? Rabbit Review American Stout 6.3 189 4.12 Baby Got Bock Review Bock 7.1 213 3.77 Big Hoppa Review American Double IPA 9.0 270 4.15 Blood Orange Wit Review Witbier 5.2 156 3.86 Chocolate Cherry Bock Review Bock 7.0 210 3.88 Coco for Coxness Review American Imperial Stout 9.5 285 4.28 Coffee Lager Review American Amber Lager 5.0 150 Cold Brew Coffee Lager Review American Lager 5.0 150 3.7 Load More Beers Proud to Support Independent Craft Brewers For years, small and independent U.S. craft breweries have been turning the beer world upside down. Their ability to take risks, innovate flavors and build better communities has made the U.S. the craft beer capital of the world. To proudly display that independent spirit, the Brewers Association created a symbol to unify U.S. craft breweries and those who want to support them. This certified mark gives beer lovers an easy way to identify independent craft beer. Learn more about what it means to be an Independent Craft Brewer by visiting the Brewers Association . As a locally owned and operated brewery, Copperpoint is committed to producing high-quality, flavorful beers that cater to a wide range of tastes. With its passion for innovation, dedication to craftsmanship, and inviting taproom atmosphere, Copperpoint Brewing Co. has become a beloved destination for beer enthusiasts and casual drinkers alike. Crafted with Excellence Copperpoint Brewing Co. takes pride in its commitment to brewing beers of exceptional quality. Using traditional brewing techniques combined with modern creativity, their team of skilled brewers carefully crafts each beer to deliver a memorable drinking experience. From hop-forward IPAs to smooth and robust stouts, Copperpoint offers a diverse selection of beers that cater to both the seasoned beer connoisseur and those new to craft brewing. Taproom Experience The Copperpoint taproom provides a warm and inviting atmosphere where beer lovers can gather, socialize, and enjoy a wide variety of brews. Immerse yourself in the world of craft beer as you explore the rotating tap list, which showcases Copperpointâ€™s core beers as well as a rotating selection of seasonal and limited-edition brews. Whether youâ€™re seeking a crisp and refreshing lager or a bold and complex ale, the knowledgeable staff at Copperpoint can guide you towards the perfect pint to suit your preferences. Brewery Tours and Events Copperpoint Brewing Co. offers brewery tours that provide a behind-the-scenes look at their brewing process. Get an up-close view of their state-of-the-art equipment, learn about the art of beer-making, and gain insights into their brewing techniques. Additionally, the brewery hosts a variety of events throughout the year, including beer release parties, tap takeovers, and special tasting events. These occasions offer the opportunity to connect with fellow beer enthusiasts, meet the brewers, and sample their latest creations. Community Engagement and Collaboration Copperpoint Brewing Co. is deeply rooted in the Boynton Beach community and actively participates in local events and initiatives. They take pride in collaborating with other local businesses, charities, and organizations to promote community engagement and support worthy causes. By enjoying a pint at Copperpoint, youâ€™re not only supporting a local brewery but also contributing to the growth and vibrancy of the community. Take Home the Experience Copperpoint Brewing Co. offers a selection of packaged beers, including cans, bottles, and growlers, allowing you to take the craft beer experience home with you. Whether youâ€™re hosting a gathering, going on a picnic, or simply stocking up your fridge, you can savor the flavors of Copperpointâ€™s exceptional beers at your convenience. Visit Copperpoint Brewing Co. Today Copperpoint Brewing Co. in Boynton Beach, Florida, is a destination that embodies the spirit of craft beer excellence. With its commitment to quality, innovative brewing techniques, and inviting taproom atmosphere, Copperpoint has established itself as a go-to spot for beer enthusiasts. Explore their diverse selection of beers, enjoy the welcoming taproom experience, and take part in brewery tours and events. By supporting Copperpoint Brewing Co., youâ€™re not only indulging in exceptional craft beer but also contributing to the vibrant local beer culture in Boynton Beach. Lewert can serve as a valuable ally during a very difficult time in your life. Moving ahead into the next season of your life is a frightening and very stressful experience, but the right lawyer can make all the difference. Tina even holds a special designation: she is board-certified in marital and family law. Lewert Law, LLC provides each prospective client with a free, confidential consultation. This consult session serves as a wonderful opportunity to share your circumstances, ask questions and discuss cost. Legal fees vary depending upon the exact nature of your situation and where you are in the divorce process. Tina L. Lewert is also a Florida Supreme Court Certified Family Law Mediator. A mediator serves as a neutral party who can help guide you through pre-divorce negotiations in a manner that allows the couple â€” not a judge â€” to decide upon the terms of the divorce. Couples are empowered as both parties work together to arrive at an agreement concerning assets, child custody, and finances. And it all occurs outside of a courtroom setting.
